definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Commercial tenants in the building are mindful of their energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 租用大廈的商戶們很注意他們的能源消耗。

sentences.english: In these countries merchants therefore usually ask for ID.
sentences.chinese: 在這些國家，商戶通常要求使用ID卡刷卡。

sentences.english: Interchange is the largest part of the fees U.S. merchants pay to accept plastic from Visa and MasterCard.
sentences.chinese: 轉換費是美國商戶支付的最主要一筆支出。

sentences.english: Some Silk Street Market stalls were shut down temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 部分秀水街商戶被暫時關閉。

sentences.english: For now businesses that get the extra foot traffic are paying nothing at all.
sentences.chinese: 目前爲止這些獲得了額外客流的商戶並沒有花費更多。

sentences.english: Knitgoods show area offers a place for merchants to show their products.
sentences.chinese: 針紡織品展示區爲商戶提供了展示產品形象的平臺。

sentences.english: The company continues processes OEM, welcome various merchants to come the person incoming letter order processing.
sentences.chinese: 公司承接加工OEM，歡迎各商戶來人來函訂購加工。

sentences.english: The term "individuals" as mentioned in Article 1 of the Regulation refers to individual industrial and commercial businesses and other individuals.
sentences.chinese: 條例第一條所稱個人，是指個體工商戶及其他個人。

sentences.english: Shop-owners have already moved all their goods out.
sentences.chinese: 商戶們已經轉移走了自己所有的東西。

sentences.english: After lighting firecrackers, shops reopen for business on this day.
sentences.chinese: 商戶可選擇在這天開張營業，而且要大放鞭炮。

sentences.english: Intra-group variety and differentiation in merchant side is a common feature in retailing platforms.
sentences.chinese: 商戶組內多樣化和差異化是零售平臺常見的特徵。

sentences.english: The site will feature merchant name, logo, description, and current offers.
sentences.chinese: 該網站將有商戶名稱，標識，說明和當前的優惠活動。

sentences.english: The Bank may change the selected merchant(s) from time to time without notice.
sentences.chinese: 本行保留隨時更改特選商戶之權利，而毋須另行通知。
商戶須預先繳付六個月月費。

sentences.english: The HKTB and participating merchant reserve the right of final decision in case of any disputes.
sentences.chinese: 如有爭議，旅發局及個別參與商戶保留最終決定權。

sentences.english: The challenge facing merchants as soon as possible rehousing they are the best answer.
sentences.chinese: 面對商戶的質疑，儘快安置他們是最好的回答。

definition: dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
